data.title: Name of the cities of Northern Cyprus in Turkish and Greek
data.meta_description:
The territory of Cyprus has been inhabited for centuries by Greeks, Turks and immigrants from Iran, Arab and European countries. Due to the mixing of cultures and languages, the main towns and districts of northern Cyprus have different names in Turkish and Greek. The most important places are listed below:


	Girne - Kyrenia
	Gazimağusa - Famagusta
	Lefkoşa - Nicosia
	Güzelyurt -…
data.text:
Updated: 9 months ago

1 Min

851

The territory of Cyprus has been inhabited for centuries by Greeks, Turks and immigrants from Iran, Arab and European countries. Due to the mixing of cultures and languages, the main towns and districts of northern Cyprus have different names in Turkish and Greek. The most important places are listed below:

Girne - Kyrenia

Gazimağusa - Famagusta

Lefkoşa - Nicosia

Güzelyurt - Morfou

Iskele - Trikomo
